Hello, World!

● 30 Apr 2017

Welcome to the website for the 2017 edition of the ICFP Programming Contest, which will be brought to you by LFCS at the University of Edinburgh!

The contest dates are between the 4th August 2017 and 7th August 2017.

Keep checking back for updates, which will appear nearer the time! In the meantime, make sure to follow us on Twitter!
